name: Parking Smash Simulator
description:
Use the power of your fingers to destroy badly parked cars!

PUNISH OUTLAWS

This guy parked his car on a disabled parking? Destroy his car!
A car is parked on a reserved parking space? Smash it!
This car has been parked by a monkey? Punish him!

BE FAST

Don't let the speed of your truck impress you, focus on badly parked cars and destroy all of them as soon as possible!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR GAME

Unlock various skins to improve your experience!
